description: Splide Logo T-Shirt Men - a functional shirt for mountain tours or relaxed hikes. The elasticated jersey material feels very comfortable thanks to its quick-drying properties. An antimicrobial treatment on the shirt reduces unpleasant odors. Another technical feature: SmartTemp by HeiQ provides dynamic cooling and additional moisture regulation for a feel-good factor.
name: Mammut Splide Logo T-Shirt - Mens
